trigger.name: Database {$DATABASE} is down or ORA error found
Query Lock list on {$DATABASE} not empty

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Pyora active send:asm_volume_size[{#ASMVOLUME}].last()} - {Template Pyora active send:asm_volume_free[{#ASMVOLUME}].last()}) / {Template Pyora active send:asm_volume_size[{#ASMVOLUME}].last()} *100 > {$ASMHIGH}
trigger_prototype.name: ASM Volume {#ASMVOLUME} used > {$ASMHIGH}% ({ITEM.LASTVALUE2} / {ITEM.LASTVALUE1})

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Pyora active send:tablespace.pused[{#TABLESPACE}].last()}>{$TABLESPACE.PUSED.CRIT:"{#TABLESPACE}"} and {Template Pyora active send:tablespace.size[{#TABLESPACE}].last()} > 0 and {Template Pyora active send:tablespace.used[{#TABLESPACE}].last()} > 0
trigger_prototype.name: Tablespace {#TABLESPACE} use is crit (used > {$TABLESPACE.PUSED.CRIT:"{#TABLESPACE}"}%}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Pyora active send:tablespace.pused[{#TABLESPACE}].last()}>{$TABLESPACE.PUSED.WARN:"{#TABLESPACE}"} and {Template Pyora active send:tablespace.size[{#TABLESPACE}].last()} > 0 and {Template Pyora active send:tablespace.used[{#TABLESPACE}].last()} > 0
trigger_prototype.name: Tablespace {#TABLESPACE} use is high (used > {$TABLESPACE.PUSED.WARN:"{#TABLESPACE}"}%}

trigger.expression: {Template Pyora active send:query_lock.last()}>0 and {Template Pyora active send:query_lock_list2.strlen()}>3
trigger.name: Query Lock on {$DATABASE} > 1
